Check out this intimate, behind-the-scenes look at four unique individuals and their stories ‚Äî including Rakuten Sports' Vanessa √ÖSELL TSURUGA üá∏üá™ üëÄ Photo description: Shots of four Rakuten employees, from a short film about workplace culture, are featured on an image showing Rakuten Group as a Telly Awards winner at the 45th Annual Telly Awards. #Sports #SportsMarketing #Rakuten #Inclusion #Culture

Unity in Motion ‚Äì an original documentary from Rakuten about the creation of the "A BETTER FUTURE TOGETHER" Dance Crew ‚Äì is available now! Watch the full documentary: https://bit.ly/3UIt6Fz The documentary captures the story of 12 dancers in Tokyo, Japan who auditioned for and were selected to form the "A BETTER FUTURE TOGETHER" Dance Crew last summer. The dancers were chosen by a group of former and current Japanese NBA dancers - including ex-Detroit Pistons and Utah Jazz dancer Reiko Ogasawara. Watch their journey ‚Äì from the first open call auditions, through rehearsals, to the group's final performance at the halftime show of the 2023 World University Basketball Series in Tokyo, Japan. #ABetterFutureTogether #WUBS #ABFT #„Çπ„Éù„Éº„ÉÑ„Å®„Å®„ÇÇ„Å´„ÇÇ„Å£„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑÊú™Êù•„Å∏ Photo description: 12 female dancers stand and pose in the middle of a basketball court during a halftime show performance.

Rakuten is now accepting donations for the 2024 Taiwan Earthquake, through the Rakuten Clutch Special Charity Fund. Your donations will be used to support the victims of this disaster. We appreciate your cooperation in helping to restore and rebuild as quickly as possible. https://bit.ly/3TTFMsJ
